fr.gouv.vitam.common.database.parser.request.single

Class RequestParserSingle

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.common.database.parser.request.AbstractParser<RequestSingle>
      • fr.gouv.vitam.common.database.parser.request.single.RequestParserSingle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteParserSingle, InsertParserSingle, SelectParserSingle, UpdateParserSingle

    public abstract class RequestParserSingle
extends AbstractParser<RequestSingle>
    Single Request Parser (common base): [ {query}, {filter} ] or { $query : query, $filter : filter }

      • addCondition

        public void addCondition(Query condition)
                  throws InvalidCreateOperationException,
                         InvalidParseOperationException
        Allow to add one condition to the current parsed Request

        Example:
         
   SelectParserSingle parser = new SelectParserSingle(...);
   parser.parse(jsonQuery);
   parser.addCondition(eq(FieldName, value));
   JsonNode newJsonQuery = parser.getRootNode();
        Parameters:
        condition - the condition to add
        Throws:
        InvalidCreateOperationException - when invalid create query exception occurred
        InvalidParseOperationException - hen invalid parse data to create query
